titleStmt.title: A song to his excellency the Ld. General Monck, at Skinners-Hall on Wednesday Aprill 4. 1660. At which time he was entertained by that honourable company.
titleStmt.author: Jordan, Thomas, 1612?-1685?
Yolkney, Walter.

notesStmt.note: Verse: "Admire not noble Sir, that you should heare".
At end of text: The Reader may take notice that this is the right speech, sung by W. Yeokney.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
